resources.string: • Native app: \n You can check metrics related to user installations and usage of your native app through the Downloads & installs, Download source analysis, Pre-orders, and User acquisition and retention menus.\n You can check the sales metrics for your native app through the In-App Purchases and Paid app details menus.
• Quick app:\n You can learn about the user and running data of your quick app through the Quick app user report and Quick app running report menus.
Sign in to AppGallery Connect and click App analytics. Click an app, go to the Distribution analysis page, and choose Downloads & installs.

The Downloads & installs report provides an overview of major indicators of your app in all channels (AppGallery and AppTouch), such as New downloads and Update downloads, charts, and data details, and supports report download.
Sign in to AppGallery Connect and click App analytics. Click an app, go to the Distribution analysis page, and choose In-App Purchase.

The In-App Purchase report provides an overview of major indicators of your app in all channels (AppGallery and AppTouch), such as Payment amount and ARPPU, charts, and data details, and supports report download.
Sign in to AppGallery Connect and click App analytics. Click an app, go to the Distribution analysis page, and choose Paid application details.
This report displays data such as Total purchases and order information, and supports report download.
Quick App User Report
Sign in to AppGallery Connect and click App analytics. Click an app, go to the Distribution analysis page, and choose Quick app user report.

The quick app user report displays metrics such as new users, active users, and user retention in a chart for your quick app, provides details about the metrics, and allows you to download the report.
Sign in to AppGallery Connect and click App analytics. Click an app, go to the Distribution analysis page, and choose Quick app running report.
Quick App Running Report

The quick app running report displays metrics such as number of app opens, app use duration, and number of icons added to home screen in a chart for your quick app, provides details about the metrics, and allows you to download the report.
Downloads & installs
Viewing Distribution Analysis
On the Distribution analysis tab page, you can view the usage and sales data of a native app, or data reports of a quick app.
In-App Purchase
Paid Application Details
https://developer.huawei.com/consumer/en/agconnect/Appanalytics/
